se.idsec.sigval.xml.svt

Class XMLDocumentSVTIssuer

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.idsec.sigval.xml.svt.XMLDocumentSVTIssuer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLSigConstants

    public class XMLDocumentSVTIssuer
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLSigConstants
    Implements functions to issue SVT for signed XML documents and to extend the signatures of the XML document with SVT tokens
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

    • Method Detail

      • issueSvt

        public byte[] issueSvt(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                       se.idsec.sigval.svt.issuer.SVTModel svtModel,
                       XMLDocumentSVTMethod svtMethod)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Issues Signature Validation Tokens to signatures of an XML document and extends the document signatures with the SVT tokens.
        Parameters:
        document - The signed document to extend
        svtModel - model providing basic SVT parameters
        svtMethod - specifying the extension strategy as defined by options declared in XMLDocumentSVTMethod
        Returns:
        bytes of signed XML document extended with SVT
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on critical errors that prevents the document from being extended as requested
